metadata.title: CVE-2014-3999 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Horde_Ldap library before 2.0.6 for Horde allows remote attackers tobypass authentication by leveraging knowledge of the LDAP bind user DN.

criterions.comment: php-horde-ldap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
